Open source technology in the age of AI

A new survey finds that leaders are increasingly turning to open source solutions to build out their tech stacks as organizations deploy generative AI across business functions. Open source AI usage and trends show widespread adoption, with over 50% of respondents leveraging open source in data, models, and tools areas. Technical maturity and developer experience influence open source use, with the technology, media, and telecommunications sectors leading the way. Organizations are using open source tools from familiar players like Meta's Llama and Google's Gemma. Most respondents are satisfied with their open source AI models, citing performance and ease of use as top reasons for satisfaction. Open source leads on cost benefits, while proprietary tools have faster time to value.
